com.stickycoding.Rokon
Class Font

java.lang.Object
  com.stickycoding.Rokon.Texture
      com.stickycoding.Rokon.Font

public class Font
extends Texture

Author:
Richard TrueType Fonts can be loaded using Font. The TTF file is loaded, drawn as tiles onto a texture and then loaded into the TextureAtlas.

Constructor Summary
Font(java.lang.String filename)
          Creates a Font, it's respective texture, and adds it to the atlas.

Constructor Detail

Font

public Font(java.lang.String filename)
Creates a Font, it's respective texture, and adds it to the atlas. Note, this must be called before the TextureAtlas is prepared.

Parameters:
filename - as it is found in the assets folder of your APK
Method Detail

Parameters:
character - a single character
Returns:
position in the pattern string, zero based

Parameters:
position - position of the character in the pattern string
Returns:
character width, as defined by the font

getCharacterWidth

public int getCharacterWidth(java.lang.String character)
Parameters:
character - the character, as it exists in the pattern string
Returns:
character width, as defined by the font
